articles.description: Tasmanians are being urged to only donate to charity shops what they would buy themselves, as the stores are again being inundated with trash.
articles.content:
Susan Clarke has worked at a Tasmanian opportunity shop for 16 years and has never seen so many donations but it's not all good news.
Key points:
